name: HellEvator (yodaxy)
description:
John goes straight down to Hell. And in an elevator. And it's for killing demons !!

Lundum Dare 48 Game Project, maide in 3 days with @totchinuko and @dsp-sola.

The game unfortunately doesn't work, we didn't have time to finish. There is no audio except music and you and the enemies are invincible. It's maybe some sort of vision of hell. 

WASD to move, Right Ctrl to shoot, Space to Jump.

Update : bug fixed the resolution not displayed correctly in game in WebGL mode.
